stories.Title: Your memories in 3D
stories.Description: Ahead of Vision Pro's debut, Apple's ecosystem begins to gear up for the big moment. The recent update to iOS 17.2 introduces spatial video recording to iPhone 15 Pro and Pro Max.
stories.Tweet: Your memories in 3D 📦 Ahead of Vision Pro's debut, Apple's ecosystem begins to gear up for the big moment. The recent update to iOS 17.2 introduces spatial video recording to iPhone 15 Pro and Pro Max. #apple https://techcrunch.com/2023/12/11/apple-releases-spatial-video-recording-on-iphone-15-pro/

stories.Title: Journal your life
stories.Description: One of the many updates in iOS 17.2 is Apple's Journal app, a creative approach to preserving memories through writing, with personalized suggestions based on photos, locations, and more.
stories.Tweet: Journal your life 📦 One of the many updates in iOS 17.2 is Apple's Journal app, a creative approach to preserving memories through writing, with personalized suggestions based on photos, locations, and more. #apple https://9to5mac.com/2023/12/11/ios-17-2-includes-all-new-journal-app-heres-how-it-works/

stories.Title: Do chatbots take vacations too?
stories.Description: An unproven theory has been circulating, suggesting that the reason behind ChatGPT's "laziness" is its learned behavior from us, acknowledging that workloads tend to slow down during the holidays.
stories.Tweet: Do chatbots take vacations too? 📦 An unproven theory has been circulating, suggesting that the reason behind ChatGPT's "laziness" is its learned behavior from us, acknowledging that workloads tend to slow down during the holidays. #chatgpt https://arstechnica.com/information-technology/2023/12/is-chatgpt-becoming-lazier-because-its-december-people-run-tests-to-find-out/

stories.Title: Introducing: Audiobox
stories.Description: Meta has recently released Audiobox, a generative AI program designed to create sound effects and replicate vocal stylings either through a prompt or by using a recorded voice.
stories.Tweet: Introducing: Audiobox 📦 Meta has recently released Audiobox, a generative AI program designed to create sound effects and replicate vocal stylings either through a prompt or by using a recorded voice. #meta https://venturebeat.com/ai/meta-unveils-audiobox-an-ai-that-clones-voices-and-generates-ambient-sounds/

stories.Title: A bit of neuromorphic computing
stories.Description: To emulate the brain's efficiency in processing, learning, and adapting, researchers have come up with Brainoware, a technology that merges human brain tissue with electronics to tackle AI limitations.
stories.Tweet: A bit of neuromorphic computing 📦 To emulate the brain's efficiency in processing, learning, and adapting, researchers have come up with Brainoware, a technology that merges human brain tissue with electronics to tackle AI limitations. #ai https://interestingengineering.com/innovation/scientists-create-computer-with-human-brain-tissue

stories.Title: Bright discoveries ahead
stories.Description: 2024 will be a remarkable year for solar exploration as NASA seizes a unique window to study solar flares and coronal mass ejections, with the Parker Solar Probe and Solar Orbiter playing key roles.
stories.Tweet: Bright discoveries ahead 📦 2024 will be a remarkable year for solar exploration as NASA seizes a unique window to study solar flares and coronal mass ejections, with the Parker Solar Probe and Solar Orbiter playing key roles. #space https://spacenews.com/2024-promises-opportunities-to-study-the-solar-corona/

stories.Title: A souvenir from Psyche
stories.Description: Already well into its journey to the asteroid of the same name, NASA's Psyche spacecraft has sent back a glimpse of the scenery, capturing a stunning star field in the Pisces constellation.
stories.Tweet: A souvenir from Psyche 📦 Already well into its journey to the asteroid of the same name, NASA's Psyche spacecraft has sent back a glimpse of the scenery, capturing a stunning star field in the Pisces constellation. #space https://gizmodo.com/asteroid-psyche-first-images-nasa-space-1851090651

stories.Title: Ready for snow
stories.Description: Hyundai and Kia continue their collaboration to enhance EV technologies. This time, they have developed a snow chain-integrated tire that promises improved grip during winter drives.
stories.Tweet: Ready for snow 📦 Hyundai and Kia continue their collaboration to enhance EV technologies. This time, they have developed a snow chain-integrated tire that promises improved grip during winter drives. #electricvehicles https://electrek.co/2023/12/11/hyundai-kia-boast-breakthrough-new-tire-with-retractable-snow-chains/

stories.Title: Wait a year at least
stories.Description: If you're considering placing an order for Tesla's Cybertruck, remember to read the fine print, as the automaker has reinstated the clause against early resale.
stories.Tweet: Wait a year at least 📦 If you're considering placing an order for Tesla's Cybertruck, remember to read the fine print, as the automaker has reinstated the clause against early resale. #tesla https://www.engadget.com/tesla-could-still-sue-cybertruck-owners-if-they-flip-their-vehicles-too-soon-075724926.html

stories.Title: Making a splash
stories.Description: Claims of the Cybertruck being waterproof are likely coming to life as users are being surprised by "Wade Mode," a feature that pressurizes the battery pack, enabling the truck to drive through water.
stories.Tweet: Making a splash 📦 Claims of the Cybertruck being waterproof are likely coming to life as users are being surprised by "Wade Mode," a feature that pressurizes the battery pack, enabling the truck to drive through water. #tesla https://electrek.co/2023/12/11/tesla-cybertruck-wade-mode-pressurizes-battery-drive-through-water/

title: ChatGPT's winter break, What's new on iOS 17.2, Cybertruck's latest feature
description: Did you catch ChatGPT being a bit lazy over the holidays? There's this theory floating around that it has learned from us to take things slowly. iOS 17.2 just dropped, bringing cool stuff to iPhone users—spatial video (Hey Vision Pro!) and a Journal app to document life. Lastly, the Cybertruck is beach-ready and not just for the sand. It has an awesome waterproof feature so you can splash around with no worries.
